meanings.definition: Relating to a state or its government.
meanings.sent1: The statal laws govern our land.
meanings.sent2: The governor made a statal decision.
meanings.sent3: The statal rules can be quite strict!
meanings.sent4: Her influence was statal, reaching every corner.
meanings.sent5: The flag symbolized the statal authority.

meanings.sent1: The statal data showed a clear trend.
meanings.sent2: She conducted a statal analysis of the numbers.
meanings.sent3: The statal numbers danced on the graph.
meanings.sent4: His predictions were as accurate as a statal report.
meanings.sent5: The professor explained the statal concepts with ease.
